item.title: 7 Best Sunrise Alarm Clocks to Snag Before the Fall 2025 Time Change
item.description: If you want to wake up with the sun but aren’t a morning person, these bedside devices can simulate a sunrise whenever you want to rouse for the day (and a sunset too).
